amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate on the effects of cost inflation on the value range of the contracts to which a small business contract reservation applies.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3434 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3434 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator McConnell. (consideration: CR 6/18/2004 S6971-6980) To express the sense of the Senate on the effects of cost inflation on the value range of the contracts to which a small business contract reservation applies.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3434 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator McConnell.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3434 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
